path: artifacts/Safe Energy Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.SafeEnergy: contracts/Safe Energy Full Smart Contract Security Audit/SafeEnergy

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeAccount` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
findings.location: Functions `includeAccount` and `_getCurrentSupply` in the Safe Energy contract.
